data.title: Mishti Chakravarty: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Mishti Chakravarty: Check out the list of all Mishti Chakravarty movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Mishti Chakravarty news on Times of India.
data.text:
Veteran Producer KS Rama Rao Launched The theatrical Trailer Of Youthful romantic entertainer 'O Saathiya'

etimes.in / Jun 26, 2023, 19:14 (IST)

The upcoming Telugu movie 'O Saathiya' is a youthful romantic entertainer with a unique concept. The film features Aryan Gowra and Mishti Chakravarty in leading roles, produced by Chandana Katta and Subhash Katta, and directed by Divya Bhavna. Legendary producer KS Rama Rao launched the trailer of the movie at the event in Hyderabad, which received positive responses. The movie's background score by Vinnu and cinematography by EJ Venu are impressive. The release of 'O Saathiya' is on July 7th at the Pan India level under the distribution of UFO movies.

'O Saathiya' is releasing at a Pan-India Level on July 7th

etimes.in / Jun 22, 2023, 12:35 (IST)

The upcoming love entertainer film 'O Saathiya' produced by Chandana Katta and Subhash Katta and directed by Divya Bhavna stars Aryan Gowra and Mishti Chakravarty as the lead roles. The film is set for a grand Pan India release on July 7th and is backed by UFO Moviez AP, Telangana Vice President, G. Lakshman, who praised the hero, heroine, and director's performance and the movie's audio and content. EJ Venu's cinematography, Vinnu's songs and Bhaskarabhatla, Ananth Sriram and Rambabu Gosala's lyrics are also noteworthy features in the film.

Aryan Gowra and Mishti Chakravarty's 'O Saathiya' surpasses 50 million streaming minutes milestone!

etimes.in / Sep 12, 2023, 15:11 (IST)

'O Saathiya,' starring Aryan Gowra and Mishti Chakravarty, has achieved a significant milestone with over 50 million streaming minutes on a popular OTT platform. Since its debut, the movie has maintained a strong viewership and garnered praise from both young and family audiences in six languages. The film's captivating storyline, written by Deepu and Aryan Gowra and directed by Divya Bhavana, offers a delightful mix of love, laughter, and emotion, making it a standout in the world of online streaming.

The Title song of 'O Saathiya' goes viral ahead of its release!

etimes.in / Jan 25, 2023, 17:02 (IST)

As everyone knows music plays a crucial role in bringing buzz to any movie. Everyone believes that if the songs are good and the music is well received then movies will become hits. One such movie is now getting ready to hit the screens. The film O Saathiya is directed by Divya Bhavana and produced by Chandana Katta under the banner of Thanvika Jashwika Creations. It is a matter of pride that both the director and the producer are ladies.

Legendary writer V.Vijayendra Prasad launches the first look and motion poster of 'O Saathiya'...!

etimes.in / Jan 13, 2023, 16:37 (IST)

Aryan Gowra and Mishti Chakravarty are playing the lead roles in the upcoming youthful musical and romantic entertainer 'O Saathiya' directed by lady director Divya Bhavana and produced by Chandana Katta under the banner of Thanvika Jashwika Creations. It is said to be a matter of pride that both the director and the producer are ladies and making their film debuts.

Nilaanjan R Datta: ‘Shadow Assassins’ brings back the horrific memories of Assam ‘secret killings’

etimes.in / Dec 06, 2022, 10:58 (IST)

This film puts the spotlight on the ‘secret killings’ of Assam, which marked the darkest period in the history of the North-Eastern state. Masked gunmen would raid the homes of those thought to be sympathisers of the outlawed militant group, ULFA, and pick them up. Their bullet-ridden and mutilated bodies were discovered across the countryside, in fields and forests, streams and rivers.

'Manikarnika..' actor Mishti Chakravarty on her role being cut down in Kangana-starrer: I was hurt

PTI / Jan 31, 2019, 20:16 (IST)

Mishti Chakravarty said she was hurt after watching Manikarnika."I was hurt. Whenever you sign a film, you are told this is what you would be doing in the film. But you realise you are not doing anything. This is a lie and that too someone tricks you into giving them extra dates so that they can cut the previously shot scenes. That's very wrong," Mishti said.

'Manikarnika' actress Mishti Chakravarty is all smiles with PM Narendra Modi and R Madhavan

TNN / Jan 20, 2019, 14:41 (IST)

Actress Mishti Chakravarthy, who is gearing up for her next big Republic Day release 'Manikarnika' recently spent some time with Prime Minister Narendra Modi as he visited Mumbai to inaugurate India’s first ever cinema museum

'Manikarnika' Controversy: Anushka Shetty’s director Ashok is not in favour of Krish’s harsh statement for Kangana Ranaut

TNN / Feb 02, 2019, 18:03 (IST)

Kangana Ranaut's 'Manikarnika: The Queen of Jhansi' is making headlines almost every day due to The clash between Kangana Ranaut and director Krish. It all started when director Krish slammed Kangana for saying that she directed 70% of the film. In a recent interview, Krish reported;y stated that he is doubtful if anyone would work with Kangana after the Manikarnika controversy.
